mapper.sql: id, type_name, create_time, creator, update_time, updator, del_time, deletor, is_delete
mapper.select: select COUNT(1) from print_type WHERE type_name=#{name}

select
from print_type where type_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')

update print_type
type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_time = #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deletor = #{deletor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
